function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Heterogeneity of systems impacting trust in smart city concept","Impact":"Decreased trust in the concept and potential reliability challenges","Mitigation":"Increase transparency in data utilization and synchronization of platforms","Technologies":"Data encryption, interoperable systems","People":"Citizens","Owner":"City authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of consent for personal data processing in smart city systems","Impact":"Privacy concerns and potential misuse of personal data","Mitigation":"Implement strategies for individuals to consent to data processing","Technologies":"Privacy-preserving technologies, consent management systems","People":"City residents","Owner":"City authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of policies, standards, and governance for data usage in smart city concepts","Impact":"Compromise of urban comfort and security","Mitigation":"Implement proper policies, standards, and governance structures","Technologies":"Data governance tools, compliance management systems","People":"City residents, city authorities","Owner":"City authorities"}]}
